JOB TITLE: Senior Full Stack Engineer

COMPANY: InnovateTech Solutions
LOCATION: San Francisco, CA (Hybrid - 3 days/week in office)
EMPLOYMENT TYPE: Full-time
SALARY RANGE: $140,000 - $180,000 + equity

ABOUT US:
InnovateTech Solutions is a fast-growing SaaS company revolutionizing the financial technology sector. We serve over 500 enterprise clients and process billions of transactions annually. Our mission is to make financial services accessible and transparent through cutting-edge technology.

JOB DESCRIPTION:
We're seeking a talented Senior Full Stack Engineer to join our core platform team. You'll work on building scalable systems that power our flagship products, collaborate with cross-functional teams, and mentor junior engineers. This role offers the opportunity to make significant technical decisions and shape our engineering culture.

REQUIRED QUALIFICATIONS:
- 5+ years of professional software development experience
- Strong proficiency in Python and modern JavaScript frameworks (React, Vue, or Angular)
- Experience with relational databases (PostgreSQL, MySQL) and NoSQL databases (MongoDB, Redis)
- Solid understanding of RESTful API design and microservices architecture
- Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, or Azure)
- Proficiency with Docker and containerization
- Strong computer science fundamentals (data structures, algorithms, system design)
- Experience with version control (Git) and CI/CD pipelines
- Excellent problem-solving and debugging skills
- Strong communication skills and ability to work in cross-functional teams

PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS:
- Experience with TypeScript
- Knowledge of GraphQL
- Experience with Kubernetes and container orchestration
- Familiarity with event-driven architecture and message queues (RabbitMQ, Kafka)
- Experience with testing frameworks (Jest, Pytest, Selenium)
- Understanding of security best practices and OWASP guidelines
- Previous experience in fintech or regulated industries
- Contributions to open source projects
- Experience with performance optimization and scalability
- Background in data engineering or machine learning

TECHNICAL STACK:
- Backend: Python (Django/FastAPI), Node.js
- Frontend: React, TypeScript, Redux
- Databases: PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis
- Infrastructure: AWS (ECS, Lambda, RDS, S3), Kubernetes
- Tools: Docker, GitHub Actions, Terraform, DataDog

RESPONSIBILITIES:
- Design, develop, and maintain scalable full-stack applications
- Write clean, maintainable, and well-tested code
- Participate in architectural decisions and technical design reviews
- Collaborate with product managers, designers, and other engineers
- Mentor junior team members and conduct code reviews
- Optimize application performance and reliability
- Participate in on-call rotation for production support
- Contribute to technical documentation and knowledge sharing
- Stay current with emerging technologies and industry trends

WHAT WE OFFER:
- Competitive salary and equity package
- Comprehensive health, dental, and vision insurance
- 401(k) matching program
- Flexible PTO policy (minimum 15 days)
- Professional development budget ($2,000/year)
- Latest MacBook Pro and equipment
- Remote work flexibility
- Quarterly team offsites
- Gym membership reimbursement
- Catered lunches when in office
- Collaborative and inclusive work environment

INTERVIEW PROCESS:
1. Initial phone screen (30 minutes)
2. Technical phone interview (60 minutes)
3. Virtual onsite (4 hours):
   - Coding challenge
   - System design interview
   - Behavioral interview
   - Team fit conversation
4. Final conversation with engineering leadership

HOW TO APPLY:
Please submit your resume and a brief cover letter explaining why you're interested in this role and what you'd bring to our team. Include links to your GitHub profile or portfolio if available.

InnovateTech Solutions is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.
